helpDescription: Ignore channels/commands when they are ran.
helpUsage: Adds/removes a channel to the ignored list.```/ignore channel <add/remove> <channel>```
Adds/removes a command to the ignored list.```/ignore command <add/remove> <command>```
Shows a list of currently ignored commands and channels.```/ignore show```
channelAddSuccess: %s has been **added** to the ignored list.
channelRemoveSuccess: Channel %s has been **removed** from ignore list.
commandAddSuccess: Command `%s` has been **added** to ignore list.
commandInvalid: Commands `help` and `ignore` cannot be added to ignore list.
commandRemoveSuccess: Command `%s` has been **removed** from ignore list.
